forces.comment: These force parameters are used by nbody.

heatmap.comment: 'sql_meta_field' is used for heat is set, otherwise time ordered IDs are used. Possible types: int,uint,real

meta_table.comment: This table is used to load meta data for all the papers.
meta_table.name: meta_data
meta_table.where_clause: arxiv IS NOT NULL AND status != 'WDN' AND (maincat='hep-th' OR maincat='hep-ph') AND id >= 2100000000

refs_table.comment: This table is used to load the graph of references in nbody.
refs_table.name: pcite

map_table.comment: This table is used to store output from nbody. It can serve as input for both tiles and nbody.
map_table.name: map_data

date_table.comment: If present, this table is used by tiles to record id range of new papers in 'world_index.json'.
date_table.name: datebdry

misc_table.comment: If present, this table is used by tiles to record last download date in 'world_index.json'.
misc_table.name: misc
